definition: meager/slight/weak/ungenerous or unkind/frivolous/to despise/to belittle/to look down on/to approach or near

sentences.english: I am weak from my youth in the horse over.
sentences.chinese: 我從我單薄的青春裏打馬而過。

sentences.english: Do you ever feel, feel so paper-thin?
sentences.chinese: 你可曾感到自己如紙片一樣單薄？

sentences.english: She wore such thin clothes (that) she caught cold.
He often wore a simple vest and a cylindrical, tasseled hat.
sentences.chinese: 他經常穿一件單薄的馬甲，戴一頂有綬帶的高帽。

sentences.english: She doesn't love dressing up, this makes her in beautiful, very thin.
sentences.chinese: 她不愛打扮，這又使她在花枝招展中，格外單薄。

sentences.english: In a snowy day, pls. not wear a little just for fashion.
sentences.chinese: 下雪天，不能爲追求時尚，穿着單薄。

sentences.english: He buttoned his thin coat against the chilling wind.
sentences.chinese: 他扣好單薄的上衣，以便抵擋刺骨的寒風。

sentences.english: We only had our thin prison clothes and broken shoes.
sentences.chinese: 我們只穿着我們單薄的囚衣和破鞋子。

sentences.english: As a thin and weak individual, comparing with whole collectivity, I'm not important.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一個單薄的個體，與渾厚的集體相比，我不重要。

sentences.english: The boundary between the wet asphalt and metal material is very fragile.
sentences.chinese: 在溼瀝青和金屬材料之間的邊界是非常單薄的。

sentences.english: I have a round face and my too thin brows added weight to my face.
sentences.chinese: 我有一個圓面，我過於單薄眉頭說重量我的臉。

sentences.english: Appear on the ground a very shallow the very weak heel publish to disc.

sentences.english: The View layer is thin and supplies no business logic.
sentences.chinese: 視圖層比較單薄，它不提供業務邏輯。

sentences.english: He was underdressed for the hiking trip and suffered hypothermia.
sentences.chinese: 他徒步旅行時穿得有些單薄，因此感覺渾身發冷。

sentences.english: You feel stretched thin, stressed-out, drained.
sentences.chinese: 你的感覺是身心單薄乏力。

sentences.english: His habitation is flimsy affair of canes and thatch.
